problem.markdown:
Capa is now an XBlock, with a lot of XModule-related mixins.
This is a normal capa problem. It has "maximum attempts" set to **5**.
>>Blockstore is designed to store.||This is a tip. <<
( ) XBlock metadata only (x) XBlock data/metadata and associated static asset files ( ) Static asset files for XBlocks and courseware ( ) XModule metadata only
